post:
Webhosting.uk.com a company backed by a decade of Industry experience offers fully managed VPS hosting packages at the best affordable prices. xLite Linux Virtual Machines are based on XEN virtualization platform with Powerful Dual Quad Core Xeon servers as the base server infrastructure, offering superior connectivity to ensure Virtual Machine delivers optimum performance and offers the flexibility to run large websites and install third party applications with ease. While the Windows VPS is powered by Hyper-V, ensures maximum efficiency and uptime of the website.

Both the Linux and Windows VPS hosting platforms are perfect for managing large websites and working with third party applications.

Loaded with the latest technology and enriched with industry leading features; these virtual private servers prove to be the best investment for the website.

In case you have any questions, you can contact our sales department by initiating a chat or by dropping an email to sales @ webhosting.uk.com or call us on 0800 862 0890 / +44-191-303-8069. You may even choose to request us to call you back by filling a simple form found here.
